channel.title: Item help
channel.description:
Can some one please help me and explain how to get a dragon bow to work?
Thank you.

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Alright I’ll try it out, I;ll message if it doesn’t work.

Is that ok?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

The 2nd code is in its place by the others , just search for 4151 , then you will see the complete code for the frames of a whip just paste it under that , the 1st code belongs to your other weapons , most likely search for “rune scimmy here”

Read full topic

item.title: Item help

item.description:

I just get 100 error’s… … …

Just to make sure, can you please tell me where to put it?

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

if (wearID == ####) { //replace #### with id of bow playerSER = 2077; // running animation playerSEW = 2076; // waling animation playerSE = 2074; // standing animation playerSEA = 426; // shooting animation }

and

} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("dark") || WeaponName.endsWith("bow") || WeaponName.endsWith("dark bow")) { setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); //accurate, rapid, longrange sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon); sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Haha, it’s ok. It happens to me all the time with other thing’s.

Lol, I wouldn’t either but I’ll figure it using what you’ve gave me. Thanks.

And also, how do I make it weild as a Dark bow and not a fist.:S

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

Hmm no offence , but sharing projectiles? we all have a gfxhandler wich contains this.

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @_ElvenLord † ElvenLord †
item.description:
@_ElvenLord wrote:

sorry i took so long i got distracted on ebay…

well basicly you gotta use this:

createProjectile(int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int gfxMoving, int startHeight, int endHeight, int lockon);

so if you wanted a steel arrow projectiles for dark bow:

createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 100, 11, 42, 35, AttackingOn);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 100, 11, 47, 40, AttackingOn);

your going to have to use it in your boolean attack. i dont want to share my projectiles as of yet.

Read full topic
